items.question: Is Pocketly free to use?
items.answer: Yes! Pocketly offers a completely free plan with essential budget tracking features. You can track up to 50 transactions per month, create 3 saving pockets, and get basic expense categorization. For unlimited features, you can upgrade to Premium or Family plans anytime.

items.question: Can I share budgets with my partner or family?
items.answer: Yes! With the Family plan, you can share accounts and budgets with up to 5 family members. Everyone gets their own secure login, and you can collaborate on shared saving goals, view combined budgets, and track household expenses together.

items.question: Is there a mobile app available?
items.answer: Pocketly is currently in beta and will be available soon on both iOS (App Store) and Android (Google Play). Join our waitlist to get early access and be notified as soon as we launch!

items.question: Do you offer a refund policy?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If you're not satisfied with Pocketly for any reason within the first 30 days, contact our support team and we'll issue a full refund—no questions asked.
